name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs a cover of 'Ren'ai Circulation'.
IRyS talks to the audience about her performance and introduces her guests.
The members of Hololive English Council join IRyS on stage and introduce themselves.

subtitles.original: 私のこと 見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Please keep your eyes on me, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 私の中のあなたほど あなたの中の私の存在は
subtitles.english: As much as you exist within me...

subtitles.original: まだまだ大きくないこともわかってるけれど
subtitles.english: ...I know that I don't yet exist as much within you.

subtitles.original: 今この同じ瞬間 共有してる実感
subtitles.english: But the feeling of sharing this very moment right now...

subtitles.original: ちりも積もればやまとなでしこ！
subtitles.english: If dust piles up, it becomes a Yamato Nadeshiko!

subtitles.original: 略して？ ちりつもやまとなでこ！
subtitles.english: Shortened? Chiritsumo Yamato Nadeko!

subtitles.original: くらくらり くらくるる あなたを見上げたら
subtitles.english: Dizzy-dizzy, spinning around, when I look up at you...

subtitles.original: それだけで まぶしすぎて
subtitles.english: ...just that alone is too dazzling.

subtitles.original: くらくるる くらくらり あなたを想っている
subtitles.english: Spinning around, dizzy-dizzy, just thinking of you...

subtitles.original: それだけで とけてしまう
subtitles.english: ...is enough to make me melt away.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate...

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが しあわせなの
subtitles.english: ...being able to meet you makes me happy.

subtitles.original: コイスルキセツハ
subtitles.english: In the season of being in love...

subtitles.original: ヨクバリ circulation
subtitles.english: ...it's a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: コイスルキモチハ
subtitles.english: With feelings of being in love...

subtitles.original: ヨクバリ circulation
subtitles.english: ...it's a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: コイスルヒトミハ
subtitles.english: With eyes of being in love...

subtitles.original: ヨクバリ circulation
subtitles.english: ...it's a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: コイスルオトメハ
subtitles.english: As a maiden in love...

subtitles.original: ヨクバリ circulation
subtitles.english: ...it's a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる あなたが名前を呼ぶ
subtitles.english: Fluffy-fluffy, floating around, when you call my name...

subtitles.original: それだけで 宙へ浮かぶ
subtitles.english: ...just that alone makes me float into the sky.

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり あなたが笑っている
subtitles.english: Floating around, fluffy-fluffy, when you are smiling...

subtitles.original: それだけで 笑顔になる
subtitles.english: ...just that alone makes me smile.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: Thank you, God, even if it's a prank of fate...

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが しあわせなの
subtitles.english: ...being able to meet you makes me happy.

subtitles.original: でも そんなんじゃ だめ もう そんなんじゃ ほら
subtitles.english: But that won't do, that won't do anymore, look...

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよ もっともっと
subtitles.english: ...my heart will evolve, more and more.

subtitles.original: そう そんなんじゃ やだ ねえ そんなんじゃ まだ
subtitles.english: Yes, I don't like it like that, hey, not like that yet...

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: ...please keep your eyes on me, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: Whew! And that was two songs in a row. Let's go!
subtitles.english: Whew! And that was two songs in a row. Let's go!

subtitles.original: Shangri-La and Ren'ai Circulation! Woo!
subtitles.english: Shangri-La and Ren'ai Circulation! Woo!

subtitles.original: Ah, I hope you guys liked those.
subtitles.english: Ah, I hope you guys liked those.

subtitles.original: I really like the gap between the two songs, you know,
subtitles.english: I really like the gap between the two songs, you know,

subtitles.original: Shangri-La from Fafner, watch Fafner, bam, it's like bam!
subtitles.english: Shangri-La from Fafner, watch Fafner, bam, it's like bam!

subtitles.original: And then Ren'ai Circulation is like ooh, azatoi.
subtitles.english: And then Ren'ai Circulation is like ooh, azatoi.

subtitles.original: Alrighty then! Now that... after singing two songs,
subtitles.english: Alrighty then! Now that... after singing two songs,

subtitles.original: I think it's time to welcome our very first guests!
subtitles.english: I think it's time to welcome our very first guests!

subtitles.original: Welcome, my friends from Hololive English Council!
subtitles.english: Welcome, my friends from Hololive English Council!

subtitles.original: IRyS!
subtitles.english: IRyS!

subtitles.original: IRyS! You did so great! Congratulations!
subtitles.english: IRyS! You did so great! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: Congratulations! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: You look so great!
subtitles.english: You look so great!

subtitles.original: You look so cute!
subtitles.english: You look so cute!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: Alrighty guys, please introduce yourselves one by one.
subtitles.english: Alrighty guys, please introduce yourselves one by one.

subtitles.original: Okay! Who's going first? Me?
subtitles.english: Okay! Who's going first? Me?

subtitles.original: Me go first? Okay!
subtitles.english: Me go first? Okay!

subtitles.original: What's up! It's Hakos Baelz from Hololive EN Council,
subtitles.english: What's up! It's Hakos Baelz from Hololive EN Council,

subtitles.original: representing Chaos!
subtitles.english: representing Chaos!

subtitles.original: Congratulations on 3D IRyS! Yay!
subtitles.english: Congratulations on 3D IRyS! Yay!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ Alrighty, next up, who wants to go next?
subtitles.english: Thank you! Alrighty, next up, who wants to go next?

subtitles.original: Me! Me! Me!
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Me!

subtitles.original: Yes! Okay!
subtitles.english: Yes! Okay!

subtitles.original: You! You go you!
subtitles.english: You! You go you!

subtitles.original: Oh hi! Oh hi! I'm Nanashi Mumei from
subtitles.english: Oh hi! Oh hi! I'm Nanashi Mumei from

subtitles.original: Hololive English Council, the Guardian of Civilization!
subtitles.english: Hololive English Council, the Guardian of Civilization!

subtitles.original: IRyS you look so nice today!
subtitles.english: IRyS you look so nice today!

subtitles.original: Thank you, Mumei!
subtitles.english: Thank you, Mumei!

subtitles.original: Alrighty, and then next, who wants to go next?
subtitles.english: Alrighty, and then next, who wants to go next?

subtitles.original: Konfuna! It's me, Ceres Fauna!
subtitles.english: Konfuna! It's me, Ceres Fauna!

subtitles.original: IRyS, I'm obsessed with you right now.
subtitles.english: IRyS, I'm obsessed with you right now.

subtitles.original: Oh, really?
subtitles.english: Oh, really?

subtitles.original: You're like a princess of my dreams.
subtitles.english: You're like a princess of my dreams.

subtitles.original: Really? A princess?
subtitles.english: Really? A princess?

subtitles.original: お姫様、お姫様、お姫様。
subtitles.english: A princess, a princess, a princess.

subtitles.original: お姫様ですか？
subtitles.english: A princess?

subtitles.original: 姫、姫！
subtitles.english: Princess, princess!

subtitles.original: The way you say "hime"
subtitles.english: The way you say "hime"

subtitles.original: sounds a little sarcastic. Thank you.
subtitles.english: sounds a little sarcastic. Thank you.

subtitles.original: Alrighty then, last but not least.
subtitles.english: Alrighty then, last but not least.

subtitles.original: Oh hello everyone, it's Ouro Kronii from Hololive English Council,
subtitles.english: Oh hello everyone, it's Ouro Kronii from Hololive English Council,

subtitles.original: the Warden of Time. IRyS...
subtitles.english: the Warden of Time. IRyS...
